heading: HR01742
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY AND/OR INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ANOMALOUS SUPPLY AND DELIVERY AGREEMENTS ENTERED INTO BY DUTY FREE PHILIPPINES CORPORATION (DFPC) WITHOUT UNDERGOING THE REQUIRED PUBLIC BIDDING, AS WELL AS THE HIGHLY SUSPICIOUS AND IRREGULAR EXTENSIONS OF THE TERMS OF THESE CONTRACTS, THREE (3) YEARS PRIOR TO THEIR RESPECTIVE EXPIRATIONS, IN AN APPARENT CASE OF MIDNIGHT DEALS BY THE PREVIOUS OFFICERS OF DFPC
principal-authors: DE VERA, EUGENE MICHAEL B.; UYBARRETA, CARLOS ROMAN; BELMONTE, RICARDO "RJ" JR. T.; MONTORO, TEODORO "TED" G.; GONZALES, AURELIO "DONG" JR. status: Pending with the Committee on GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY since 2018-03-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01742
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY AND/OR INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ANOMALOUS SUPPLY AND DELIVERY AGREEMENTS ENTERED INTO BY DUTY FREE PHILIPPINES CORPORATION (DFPC) WITHOUT UNDERGOING THE REQUIRED PUBLIC BIDDING, AS WELL AS THE HIGHLY SUSPICIOUS AND IRREGULAR EXTENSIONS OF THE TERMS OF THESE CONTRACTS, THREE (3) YEARS PRIOR TO THEIR RESPECTIVE EXPIRATIONS, IN AN APPARENT CASE OF MIDNIGHT DEALS BY THE PREVIOUS OFFICERS OF DFPC
